summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 5, 2019. It records official inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster entry for an inmate on suicide watch, which is significant given Jeffrey Epstein's death by suicide at this facility on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, showing counts by housing unit and including an inmate on suicide watch.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is dated August 5, 2019, five days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The inmate roster shows an inmate (REG NO 0001) categorized under 'HOSP' with assignment 'SUICIDE OR' on August 5, 2019.
The document is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet showing inmate population distribution across housing units at MCC New York.
The count sheet includes verification procedures and requires submission 45 minutes prior to the affected count.
No specific inmate names are listed in the provided text, only registry numbers and unit assignments.
